title: Council Directive 91/465/EEC of 22 July 1991 amending Directive 86/466/EEC concerning the Community list of less-favoured farming areas within the meaning of Directive 75/268/EEC (Spain)
header:
COUNCIL DIRECTIVE of 22 July 1991 amending Directive 86/466/EEC concerning the Community list of less-favoured farming areas within the meaning of Directive 75/268/EEC (Spain) (91/465/EEC)
THE COUNCIL OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body: The list of less-favoured areas of Spain as set out in the Annex to Directive 86/466/EEC is hereby amended in accordance with the lists set out in the Annexes to this Directive.
This Directive is addressed to the Kingdom of Spain.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 22 July 1991.
For the CouncilThe PresidentP. DANKERT
(1)OJ No L 128, 19. 5. 1975, p. 1.
(2)OJ No L 93, 30. 3. 1985, p. 1.
(3)OJ No C 176, 8. 7. 1991, p. 144.
(4)Opinion delivered on 12 July 1991 (not yet published in the Official Journal).
(5)OJ No L 273, 24. 9. 1986, p. 104.
(6)OJ No L 308, 25. 10. 1989, p. 23.
